entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
